It had been a few days since Yukari had resolved to\nfocus on her Tatarigami problem.%K%P
It must have been a blissful few days for her, as I\ncontinued to shower her with affection.%K%P
\dAkira, are you still awake?\d%K%P
I'd even gotten used to sleeping together with her\nin the nude.%K%P
Touching Yukari's bare skin still made my heart\nrace, but I didn't lose my cool anymore.%K%P
\dYeah, I just can't seem get to sleep.\d%K%P
\dYou probably still have some energy to blow off.\nShall I help you with that?\d%K%P
\dNo, you don't have to. I'm fine.\d%K%P
Maybe if we just chatted about mundane things, I'd\nnod off eventually.%K%P
\dYou know Kaede...\d%K%P
\dWhat drove her to want to stop being a\nTatarigami?\d%K%P
\d...Did she say something to you?\d%K%P
\dNo, it's just... Shion was throwing a tantrum.\d%K%P
The situation hadn't changed even after Yukari had\nbeen the one to spend time with me for days on end.%K%P
It wasn't surprising that Shion would think the\nplan wasn't working.%K%P
\dNo need to rush things. If overcoming your Tatari\nwas so easy, neither you nor Kaede would've had\nsuch a hard time fighting it.\d%K%P
\dI understand that, but...\d%K%P
\dI still think we need to change things up a\nlittle.\d%K%P
I spent the whole night thinking about the best\nplan of action.%K%P
Maybe it was time to move to the next step.%K%P
The next morning, I told everyone what I had been\nthinking about.%K%P
\dThe rear shrine?\d%K%P
I was going to take Yukari to the rear shrine.%K%P
Since Kaede had changed from being a Tatarigami\nthere, it may hold the key to solving our problems.%K%P
\dI see... It is a special place, after all. I\nwouldn't be surprised if something did happen\nthere.\d%K%P
\dI use my Jinriki to put a barrier around Chinju\nforest, but strange things that can't be explained\nhappen there all the time.\d%K%P
\dReally?\d%K%P
\dThat's just how special the forest is. I am merely\nborrowing it for my lodgings.\d%K%P
Chinju Forest had existed for a long time, longer\nthan Kaede had been there.%K%P
\dIt's not special because of the rear shrine. On\nthe contrary, the rear shrine was built there\nbecause the forest is such a sacred place.\d%K%P
\dWhat's in that forest...?\d%K%P
\dI don't know. It's full of mysteries even I don't\nfully understand.\d%K%P
\dI think you should give it a try.\d%K%P
\dYukari's never been there before, right?\d%K%P
Shion was right.%K%P
Of the four of us, Yukari was the only one who had\nnever set foot in Chinju Forest.%K%P
\dWell then, shall we go have a look?\d%K%P
\dAbsolutely!\d%K%P
\d...All right. Here we go.\d%K%P
\dI've adjusted the barrier temporarily to allow\nYukari to enter.\d%K%P
The barrier around the forest had apparently been\naltered, even though nothing seemed different.%K%P
\dThank you, Kaede.\d%K%P
\dI can accompany you if you like?\d%K%P
Kaede seemed to be looking out for Yukari.%K%P
\dNo thank you. Please allow me to enter with Akira\nalone.\d%K%P
\dI guess that is for the best, but I can't help\nfeel a little worried.\d%K%P
\dSee you later, Akira. Take care of Yukari.\d%K%P
Kaede agreed to wait for us to return.%K%P
\dLet's go, Yukari.\d%K%P
\dOkay!\d%K%P
We entered the forest together, hand in hand.%K%P
\dSo this is Chinju Forest...\d%K%P
The forest was deep, and its foliage thick.%K%P
We headed for the rear shrine while fully taking in\nour surroundings.%K%P
\dHere we are. The Kamimori rear shrine.\d%K%P
\dIt looks a little...worn out.\d%K%P
She sighed as if disappointed by what she saw.%K%P
\dWell, Kaede and Shion were still living here until\na short while ago.\d%K%P
\dThis looks more like Shion's doing than Kaede's.\d%K%P
\dOf course.\d%K%P
We had cleaned the place up rather nicely during\nthe move, but it had since reverted to its previous\nstate.%K%P
\dI think Shion still comes here once in a while.\nShe probably uses it when she feels like lazing\naround.\d%K%P
\dHer personal effects back home tend to increase\nand decrease at random. Maybe she uses this place\nfor storage?\d%K%P
I could totally see Shion doing that.%K%P
Only she would dare to misuse a sacred shrine\nbuilding like that.%K%P
\dSo...what do we do now?\d%K%P
\dDoesn't seem like anything's changed by you\ncoming here, huh?\d%K%P
I wasn't exactly expecting Yukari to be relieved of\nher fate as a Tatarigami upon entering, but to have\nnothing happen at all? It was such an anti-climax.%K%P
\dDo we head back? Or should we wait a little while\nmore?\d%K%P
\dLet's spend some more time here. Kaede can wait a\nlittle longer.\d%K%P
Or we could call her and tell her to head home\nbefore us.%K%P
I took out my smartphone, and looked at the screen.%K%P
\dNo service...\d%K%P
\dDoesn't Shion use the internet here?\d%K%P
\dI'm pretty sure it's a wired connection. Other\nsignals don't work out here.\d%K%P
It seemed like there were electrical and\ncommunication lines here.%K%P
But they were only for internet use; we couldn't\nfind a phone anywhere.%K%P
\dMaybe we should head back and tell her in\nperson.\d%K%P
\dAnd double back again? Nah, let's just stick\naround for another 15 minutes, maybe.\d%K%P
\dAll right.\d%K%P
We decided to stay at the rear shrine a while\nlonger, just in case.%K%P
If nothing happened, we'd go back and think of\nsomething else.%K%P
\dI know we're only waiting around, but I still feel\nrather nervous.\d%K%P
\dYeah... Wanna play one of Shion's games?\d%K%P
\dWe probably shouldn't. Not if we only have 15\nminutes.\d%K%P
She was right. If we got too into the game, we may\nend up staying much longer than we should.%K%P
I'd feel bad if I had to tell Kaede we had made her\nwait for an hour or more while the two of us were\nhaving fun.%K%P
\dThen let's just chat or something.\d%K%P
I groped for a topic of conversation.%K%P
\dWhoa! I found something good!\d%K%P
I picked up a photograph and showed it to Yukari.%K%P
\dWhat is it?\d%K%P
\dA photo of us three when Shion first joined us.\d%K%P
Me, Kaede, and Shion.%K%P
Shion's heart had still been closed up at that\ntime, so there was a sour look on her face.%K%P
\dI can't imagine her like that now.\d%K%P
\dYeah, she's mellowed out a lot since then.\d%K%P
Sometimes it was hard to tell if that was a good or\nbad thing.%K%P
But I'd like to think it was a change for the\nbetter.%K%P
\d...You have such a fond look on your face, Akira.\d%K%P
\dDo I?\d%K%P
\dIt's the same smile you use for me...\d%K%P
\dI feel like I'm the most important one to you now,\nbut I know that won't last forever...\d%K%P
Yukari gazed at the photo sadly.%K%P
\dBecause I hid in my room when it wasn't my turn, I\ndidn't see anything and I don't know anything.\d%K%P
\dI never saw how you treated the other two...\d%K%P
\dI don't even want to imagine it. I'd rather\nbelieve it never happened.\d%K%P
\dBut that's wrong, isn't it? They love you the same\nway I do.\d%K%P
Yukari's tone of voice got stronger as she went on.%K%P
Her trembling hand closed around the edge of the\nphoto tighter and tighter.%K%P
\dYukari...?\d%K%P
\dIt's not right. That's not how it should be! You\ndon't see the real me at all.\d%K%P
\dEhehe! Did you know that Tatarigami are really\ngood actresses?\d%K%P
\dHow else would we be able to bear this burden?\nSmiling and laughing, pretending we feel nothing.\nThat's the only way to protect our hearts!\d%K%P
She was rambling, the photo still in her hand.%K%P
Soon tendrils of dark Jinriki started leaking out\nof her entire body.%K%P
\dYukari? Yukari!\d%K%P
\dThe wife you love and adore isn't the real me!\d%K%P
\dIt's not me you love, but the adorable little wife\nI've been playing!\d%K%P
\dThe real me is a lot uglier, foul-tempered, and\nwith the blackest heart anyone's ever known!\d%K%P
\dWhat's this about loving all three Goddesses\nequally? Nothing but a pretty farce!\d%K%P
\dDon't you think so? How can something so\nidealistic ever work out?\d%K%P
\dKaede and Shion may smile and nod agreeably, but\nI'm sure they feel the same way I do!\d%K%P
\dDeep inside, they want Akira all for themselves!\d%K%P
Yukari was finally venting out her true feelings.%K%P
The other Yukari, the side of her that had been\nrepressed so long, was coming out.%K%P
This had to be the \ddark feeling\d Kaede had talked\nabout.%K%P
\dWhat do you think, Akira? What are you going to\ndo with us?\d%K%P
\d...No matter what you say, Yukari, my stance on\nthis matter will still be the same.\d%K%P
My resolve to treat the three of them equally would\nnever change.%K%P
I firmly believed there was no other way.%K%P
\dI see... In the end, even you're like that.\d%K%P
\dEven you won't tell me what you really think...\d%K%P
Yukari's words sent a chill up my spine.%K%P
\dHehehe... But that's fine. That's how things\nalways are.\d%K%P
\dI am Yukari Amatsu. A Tatarigami hated by every\nliving thing under the sun.\d%K%P
\dI expect nothing. I'm resigned to my fate.\d%K%P
\dWho cares if I'm misunderstood? What does it\nmatter if nobody answers my pleas?\d%K%P
\dI do what I want. That is all.\d%K%P
\dI should have done this right from the start.\d%K%P
\dCome now, Akira, come to me...\d%K%P
She stretched out a hand towards me, an unnatural\nsmile frozen on her face.%K%P
\dI'll make you mine and mine alone. I won't let you\nget away from me. I'll never let you go.\d%K%P
\dOh, my prince charming... Let us become one and\nspend all of eternity together!\d%K%P
\dI love you so much, my dearest husband. My love is\nso boundless it can envelope the entire world!\d%K%P
\dMy Akira!\d%K%P
Yukari's dark Jinriki exploded outwards.%K%P
Her Tatari spread out and swallowed everything up.%K%P
\dWhat...?\d%K%P
Thanks to my own powers, the Tatari had no effect\non me.%K%P
But everything else had changed.%K%P
\dIt's...night?\d%K%P
No, not night. Yukari's Tatari had turned the sky\npitch-black.%K%P
\dEhehehe! Now it's just you and me in the whole\nwide world...\d%K%P
\dNobody can interfere with us now.\d%K%P
\dCome, Akira. Let's love each other forever and\never!\d%K%P
\dEhehe!\d%K%P
\dAhahaha!\d%K%P
